requestId.description: A unique identifier for the request.

callbackUrl.description: An optional webhook URL to call upon completion or failure.

requestStatus.description: The current status of the request.

uploadTimeout.description: A timestamp indicating when the input uploads will timeout.

inputProtocol.description: Protocol to use for uploading inputs.

inputLocations.description: A mapping of input file names to their corresponding upload details.

url.description: A URL for uploading the input file.

status.description: The upload status of the specific input file.

headers.description: A mapping headers that must be sent while uploading the input file.
